class="inside panels-flexible-region-inside panels-flexible-region-9-center-inside"> <div class="panel-pane pane-views pane-crusty-job-list pane-job-list" > <div class="pane-content"> <div class="view class="views-field views-field-published-at" > <a href="/posts?order=published_at&amp;sort=asc" title="sort by Post Date" class="active">Post Date</a> </th> <th class="views-field views-field-title" > src="http://www.startupers.com/misc/arrow-desc.png" width="13" height="13" alt="sort descending" title="sort descending" /></a> </th> <th class="views-field views-field-city-1" > <a href="/posts?order=city_1&amp;sort=desc" title="sort by Location" class="active">Location</a> </th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr class="odd views-row-first"> <td class="views-field id="content"> <div class="clearfix"></div> <header> <h1 id="page-title">Crusty Posts</h1> </header> <div class="region region-content"> <div id="block-system-main" class="block block-system"> <div class="block-inner clearfix"> <div class="block-content content"> <div class="panel-flexible panels-flexible-9 clearfix" id="crusty"> <div class="panel-flexible-inside panels-flexible-9-inside"> <div class="content-inner"> <section id="main-content" role="main"> <div id="content"> <div class="clearfix"></div> <header> <h1 id="page-title">Crusty Posts</h1> </header> <div class="region id="crusty"> <div class="panel-flexible-inside panels-flexible-9-inside"> <div class="panels-flexible-region panels-flexible-region-9-sidebar_left panels-flexible-region-first "> <div class="inside class="inside panels-flexible-region-inside panels-flexible-region-9-center-inside"> <div class="panel-pane pane-views pane-crusty-job-list pane-job-list" > <div class="pane-content"> <div class="view </div> </div> <div class="panel-pane pane-node-body" > <h2 class="pane-title">About Us:</h2> <div class="pane-content"> <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>check out the website for more info</p> </div></div></div> </div> </div> <div class="panel-pane pane-node-body" > <h2 class="pane-title">Job Description:</h2> <div class="pane-content"> <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>OVERVIEW</p> <p>We need someone with impeccable writing skills who also has vast knowledge of the social space. I'm not talking just having a facebook page or knowing how to tweet... we mean actually LOVES the social space and seeing how the landscape continues to evolve from an enterprise perspective. </p> <p>MUSTS</p> <p>-Seriously great writing skills. Control over tone. Great diction. Amazing Syntax.<br /> -Socially savvy with intuitive mind into analyzing different strategies of enterprises (fortune 1000 or agencies)<br /> -Focus on deadlines and get content out on time<br /> -Sense of humor<br /> -Be in San Francisco</p> <p>RESPONSIBILITIES</p> <p>-Blog posts<br /> -White papers<br /> -Case studies<br /> -Social posts</p> <p>EDUCATION:</p> <p>Smart enough to write well.<br /> Have you done this before? Do you have examples of your writing?</p> <p>Compensation<br /> Will be based upon experience. Initially part-time so you can bust your chops but we definitely need someone full time so the opportunity is there.</p> </div></div></div> </div> </div> <div class="panel-pane pane-custom pane-3 apply-left" > <div class="pane-content"> <a class="sweet-apply simple-dialog">Apply Here</a> </div> </div> <div class="panel-pane pane-custom pane-4" > <div class="pane-content"> <div class="clearfix"></div> </div> </div> <div class="panel-pane pane-custom pane-5" id="notice"> <div class="pane-content"> <div class="white-box radius"> <p>For security purposes you cannot send an email to yourself. If you want to test our "Apply Here" link, you must login to StartUpers under an account other than the one used to create this post.</p> <p>Trust us. It works,<br /> Milton</p> </div> </div> </div> <div class="panel-pane pane-block pane-block-25" > <div class="pane-content"> <div class="bgd-spinner"> <div class="form-spinner"><img
